page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL SCHOOLTEACHERS WHO LIVE IN THE VILLAGE,AMONG THEM MR MARDEN,THE COMMUNITY RELATIONS OFFICER AT SYDENHAM SECONDARY SCHOOL.HE ORGANISES THE SPORTS CENTRE,LETTINGS, COURSES FOR THE PUBLIC AND CHILDREN IN THE HOLIDAYS AND TAKES PARTIES OF CHILDREN ON AN ANNUAL SKIING TRIP TO SWITZERLAND.HIS WIFE WORKS AS HIS SECRETARY.THE REV.DIXON,MINISTER OF THE UNITARIAN CHURCHES IN TAUNTON AND BRIDGWATER,LIVES NEAR THE SCHOOL,WHICH HE VISITS TO ATTEND THE MORNING ASSEMBLY FROM TIME TO TIME,AND ALSO TO TEACH ITALIC HANDWRITING.HE IS ALSO AN EXPERT CARTOGRAPHER AND DESIGNED AND DREW THE RECENTLY ERECTED VILLAGE MAP. THERE IS STILL A BLACKSMITH'S FORGE OPPOSITE THE CHURCH,WHERE MESSRS TUCKER MADE THE NEW WROUGHT IRON GATES FOR THE CHURCH.TWO WET FISH MERCHANTS DELIVER AND ALSO A BAKER AND LIBRARY.
